title: Two T210 Series 6 Individual cards for sale

posts.post_title: Two T210 Series 6 Individual cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello I have two T210 Series 6 cards left to sell individually.  

1. Kuhlman Paris: VG-EX  80.00

2. Womble Shelbyville: VG 80.00

Scans are available upon request.  I can accept payment by paypal, money order, check, etc.  Please email me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  if interested.  You can take the pair for 150.00 plus shipping if anyone is interested.  You can submit offers also.  Thanks

Tony
